channel.title: Upcoming events on Todmorden Events
channel.description: Recent content in Upcoming events on Todmorden Events

item.title: Family Coding Club
item.description:
An informal drop-in coding session for children and families. Activities include simple games, creative coding, and playful experiments with computers.

No prior experience needed. Suitable for ages 7+ with an accompanying adult.

item.title: Family Coding Club

item.title: Repair Café
item.description:
A regular Repair Café where volunteers help fix household items such as small appliances, clothing, and bikes. Bring along something broken and see if it can be repaired rather than thrown away.

No charge, donations welcome.
